name: Successfully cancel a Request to Pay
fullName: A Creditor Service Provider can cancel a Request to Pay: Successfully cancel a Request to Pay

steps.name: Given the debtor A has fiscal code random
And the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
And the debtor Service Provider activated the debtor A
And the creditor Service Provider is authenticated
Given the creditor Service Provider sent an RTP to the debtor A
When the creditor Service send a cancellation request for the RTP

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Creditor Service Provider can cancel a Request to Pay
